name: py-smac

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SMAC is a tool for algorithm configuration to optimize the parameters of
arbitrary algorithms, including hyperparameter optimization of Machine
Learning algorithms.

dependencies.name: py-configspace
dependencies.description:
Creation and manipulation of parameter configuration spaces for
automated algorithm configuration and hyperparameter tuning.

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-emcee
dependencies.description:
emcee is an MIT licensed pure-Python implementation of Goodman & Weare's
Affine Invariant Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) Ensemble sampler.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pynisher
dependencies.description:
A small Python library to limit the resources used by a function by
executing it inside a subprocess.

dependencies.name: py-pyrfr
dependencies.description:
This package serves as the python interface to RFR, an extensible C++
librarry for random forests.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
